short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides uploading to Clipia directly from Stadia captures

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides an interface to upload clips and screenshots directly from Stadia's capture page, right to Clipia. 

Once the extension is installed, you just head over to https://stadia.google.com/captures and select any clip or screenshot and an "Upload to Clipia" button will be available.

Once uploaded to clipia, you can trim your clip down to the important bits and share it.
